msg.msgText:
This command enables the management of users, including adding users, listing users, updating users, and deleting users. SYNTAX: imaserver user help imaserver user <Action> help imaserver user <Action> <ActionOptions> EXAMPLE: imaserver user help imaserver user add help imaserver user delete help imaserver user add "UserID=msgUser1" "Type=Messaging" "Password=XXXXX"
Action Choose from one of the following: add delete edit list ActionOptions Options for the action.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
